name: City Center West
address: 7201 W Lake Mead Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89128
comments: High Image Class A building Located in the northwest submarket with visibility from us - 95. Near 2 hospitals and high concentration of retail amenities within walking distance

name: The Canyons
address: 1140 N Town Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89144
comments: Sublease expiring Sept 2022. Class A office park with prime Summerlin location. Space has large reception area with 2 conference rooms, 10 offices, 3 large corner offices, multiple bullpen areas, work room  and breakroom

name: 4245 S Grand Canyon Dr
address: 4245 S Grand Canyon Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89147
comments: Second floor grey shell office over retail. Excellent city and mountain views with immediate access to the 2015 Beltway. Surrounded by numerous retail amenities.

name: Fort Apache Corporate Ctr
address: 4730 S Fort Apache Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89147
comments: Multi-tenant high-image building located in the Southwest with frontage along the 215 - Beltway. Building signage available. Suite ready for immediate occupancy.

name: 101 Convention Center
address: 101 Convention Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89109
comments: 12 story high-rise located directly off the Las Vegas Strip with easy access to freeways, the convention centers and McCarran International Airport. Onsite caf?, property management, security and building engineer

name: The 1785 Office Center
address: 1785 E Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89104
comments: Second generation. Property improvements underway include landscaping, parking lot and common area upgrades, painting and bathroom upgrades. Covered parking available. Central location.

name: The HC 3773
address: 3773 Howard Hughes Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89169
comments: With 1.4 million sq ft and ten Class A buildings. The Hughes Center is the largest masterplanned office campus in the state. Centrally located, this high profile property is minutes from McCarran International Airport, The Strip, UNLV and major hightways. On Site property management, 24/7 security and parking garage. Fitness center available to tenants 24/7. State-of-art telecommunications. Numerous fast food and fine dinning locations on campus. Unmatched flexibility and growth.
